org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.Pattern

  • public final class Pattern
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity to apply a canvas pattern into a dataset as background.
    See here some interesting pattern images.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Pattern DEFAULT_PATTERN
      Default of pattern, with null on canvas pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pattern(AbstractChart<?,?> chart, com.google.gwt.dom.client.ImageElement image)
      Creates the object using chart (to get canvas and context) to create the pattern and image to use in the pattern.
      The repetition used is repeat.
      Pattern(AbstractChart<?,?> chart, com.google.gwt.dom.client.ImageElement image, com.google.gwt.canvas.dom.client.Context2d.Repetition repetition)
      Creates the object using chart (to get canvas and context) to create the pattern, image to use in the pattern and repetition to apply to pattern.
      Pattern(AbstractChart<?,?> chart, com.google.gwt.resources.client.ImageResource image)
      Creates the object using chart (to get canvas and context) to create the pattern and image to use in the pattern.
      The repetition used is repeat.
      Pattern(AbstractChart<?,?> chart, com.google.gwt.resources.client.ImageResource image, com.google.gwt.canvas.dom.client.Context2d.Repetition repetition)
      Creates the object using chart (to get canvas and context) to create the pattern, image to use in the pattern and repetition to apply to pattern.
      Pattern(com.google.gwt.canvas.dom.client.CanvasPattern pattern)
      Creates the object using a canvas pattern.

      • Pattern

        public Pattern(com.google.gwt.canvas.dom.client.CanvasPattern pattern)
